hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: User ID (from User_Listing file) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The DateTime the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: batchId
hasAttributes.description: Systems generated ID for batch

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: description
hasAttributes.description: Description of the payment.

hasAttributes.name: glCreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side  of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glDebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit  side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: lineAccountId
hasAttributes.description: General Ledger Account code of the GL-revenue-account. Can be including sub-account id. It can contain many different levels to identify the Account. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group and branch/department.

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAmountCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount in transaction currency - USD , EUR , GBP , INR

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAnalysisAmount
hasAttributes.description: The amount of the payment line for analysis

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAnalysisAmountCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard. Example: EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAnalysisAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAnalysisAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: The currency for local reporting  requirements. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAnalysisId
hasAttributes.description: Analysis ID: e.g. 1200-HDOF-TR (for cost center treasury in the headoffice), P-4800-123 (for project 123 in branch 4800)

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAnalysisIdDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the AnalysisID: e.g. "Headoffice-Treasury".

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAnalysisType
hasAttributes.description: Analysis type identifier: e.g. CC (for Cost Center), DEP (for department), etc

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisTypeDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the AnalysisType, e.g. "Cost Center"

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedBy
hasAttributes.description: User ID (from User_Listing file) for person  who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: lineBusinessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited. Must match the Business_Unit_Code in the Business_Unit_Listing file.

hasAttributes.name: lineCustomerId
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer

hasAttributes.name: lineDebitCreditIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amounts on line-level are debit or credit amounts. Entry must correspond to entry reflected in General Ledger Entry. Signing of line amounts is relative to this indicator. E.g. a return can lead to a negative amount

hasAttributes.name: lineDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of payment line

hasAttributes.name: lineLastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineLastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: lineLineNumber
hasAttributes.description: Line item number of the payment

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountLocalCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: The currency for local reporting requirements. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional or group currency. No  multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all  transactions should be recorded in a single  currency.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount in local  currency.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard. Example: EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount in foreign currency

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard. Example: EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementPaymentMechanism
hasAttributes.description: Payment mechanism

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementAmount
hasAttributes.description: In the header's default currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementDate
hasAttributes.description: Date settled

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementDiscount
hasAttributes.description: Description Settlement / Other Discount

hasAttributes.name: lineSourceDocumentId
hasAttributes.description: The source document to which the line relates

hasAttributes.name: lineSupplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the customer from whom payment is due or to whom unused credits have been applied. Must match the Customer_Account_ID in the Customer_Listing_YYYYMMDD file.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the  creation date. This should be a system- generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not  necessarily correspond with the date of the  transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for person  who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmount
hasAttributes.description: In the header's default currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount in foreign currency

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard. Example: EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBase
hasAttributes.description: The base on which the tax is calculated. This can be an amount, or a quantity, eg. Litres.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBaseDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the value in the TaxBase. Eg. Litres for excises on alcoholic bevarages.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxCode
hasAttributes.description: Tax Code for lookup in tables

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxDeclarationPeriod
hasAttributes.description: The identification of the declaration/return in which the TaxAmount is reported to the Revenue body

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxExemptionReason
hasAttributes.description: Tax exemption or reduction reason or rationale

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxPercentage
hasAttributes.description: Tax percentage.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxType
hasAttributes.description: Tax type for look-up in tables

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxPointDate
hasAttributes.description: Tax Point date where recorded or if not recorded then the Invoice date

hasAttributes.name: paymentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each payment received. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, customer and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: paymentMethod
hasAttributes.description: The code value or indicator of the method by which the transaction debit or credit amount was extinguished or apportioned to the debt by the supplier (for example, check, wire transfer, cash, and so on). Must match the Payment_Type in the Payment_Type_Listing_YYYYMMDD file.

hasAttributes.name: paymentRefDate
hasAttributes.description: Date on an externally generated transaction (for example, check date or wire transfer date).

hasAttributes.name: paymentRefNo
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each payment made. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, supplier and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: period
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the Effective_Date occurs.Examples include W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: periodYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the Invoice_Date occurs ”YYYY for delimited, CCYY-MM-DD fiscal year end (ISO 8601) for extensible business reporting language global ledger taxonomy framework (XBRL GL).

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description: Status of the transaction's posting to the GL (for example, "Posted," "Not Posted").

hasAttributes.name: receiptAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: receiptId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each payment received. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, customer and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: referenceDate
hasAttributes.description: Date on an externally generated transaction (for example, check date or wire transfer date).

hasAttributes.name: referenceNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identification number for an internally or externally generated transaction (for example, check number, wire transfer number, or original document ID).

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: sourceId
hasAttributes.description: Posting source (code for source from which the journal entry originated, such as sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, and so on).

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the  creation date. This should be a system- generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not  necessarily correspond with the date of the  transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: systemId
hasAttributes.description: Unique number created by the system for the document

hasAttributes.name: transactionDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the payment was made or credit was applied.

hasAttributes.name: transactionId
hasAttributes.description: Cross-reference to GL posting. It can contain many different levels to identify the transaction. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group and branch/department

hasAttributes.name: salesPostingRules
hasAttributes.description: The rules defined for Sales posting (eg day end, batch, individual etc)

hasAttributes.name: standardRefund
hasAttributes.description: Stores the maximum number of days allowed for refund .

hasAttributes.name: revenueClassification
hasAttributes.description: Revenue policy value that defers revenue on transactions of customers that match the classification ( Eg: Def rev for subscriptions )

hasAttributes.name: claimCreationFlag
hasAttributes.description: Indicates if claims should be created for customer raised disputes

hasAttributes.name: minWriteOffAmount
hasAttributes.description: Minimum write-off amount.

hasAttributes.name: maxWriteOffAmount
hasAttributes.description: Maximum write-off amount.

hasAttributes.name: minRefundAmount
hasAttributes.description: Minimum amount in functional currency for which refund can be issued

hasAttributes.name: maxRefundAmount
hasAttributes.description: Maximum amount in functional currency for which refund can be issued

hasAttributes.name: allowLateCharges
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify if late charges are allowed

hasAttributes.name: totalChargeBackValue
hasAttributes.description: Sum of the AMOUNT_DUE_ORIGINAL on payment schedules (installments) of all chargebacks for the specific customer account, site, currency and date.

hasAttributes.name: totalChargeBackCount
hasAttributes.description: Count of the payment schedules (installments) of all chargebacks for the specific customer account, site, currency and date.

hasAttributes.name: totalEarnedDiscValue
hasAttributes.description: Sum of the Earned Discounts that were given on the closed payment schedules (installments) of all invoices for the specific Account, Site, Currency and a date.

hasAttributes.name: totalEarnedDiscount
hasAttributes.description: Sum of the Earned Discounts that were given on the closed payment schedules (installments) of all invoices for the specific Account, Site, Currency and a date.

hasAttributes.name: totalAdjustmentValue
hasAttributes.description: Sum of the adjustment amounts on the payment schedules of all the debit items for the specific Account, Site, Currency and a date (identified by as_of_date column). Special adjustments, such as Adjustment Reversal, are not included because they are used for internal accounting purposes only.

hasAttributes.name: totalAdjustmentCount
hasAttributes.description: Count of the adjustments on the payment schedules of all the debit items for the specific Account, Site, Currency and a date. Special adjustments, such as Adjustment Reversal are not included.

hasAttributes.name: customerid
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer

hasAttributes.name: lineAnlaysisTypeDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the AnalysisType, e.g. "Cost Center"

hasAttributes.name: receiptAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: "The reporting currency related to the receipt amount for nonconsolidated reporting. See ISO 4217 coding."
